quotes.name: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.name: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.name: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.name: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.name: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.name: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.name: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.name: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.name: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.name: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.name: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.name: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.name: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.name: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.name: Your limitation—it’s only your imagination.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.name: Sometimes later becomes never. Do it now.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.name: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.name: Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.name: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.name: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.name: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.name: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.name: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.name: It’s going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.name: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.name: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.name: If you want to achieve greatness, stop asking for permission.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.name: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down.
quotes.author: Chantal Sutherland

quotes.name: Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.name: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.name: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.name: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.name: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.name: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.name: If you can dream it, you can do it.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.name: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.name: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.name: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.name: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.name: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.name: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.name: Little things make big days.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.name: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
quotes.author: Tim Notke

quotes.name: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.name: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.name: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.name: Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.name: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.name: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.name: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
quotes.author: Beverly Sills

quotes.name: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.author: Jim Ryun

quotes.name: You can either experience the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The choice is yours.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.name: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.name: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.name: Don’t wait for someone to bring you flowers. Plant your own garden.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.name: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln
